verses.verse: And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> with the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H8104>Keep<s%> all the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And it shall be on the <S%H3117>day<s%> when ye shall pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee, that thou shalt set thee <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>, and <S%H7874>plaister<s%> them with <S%H7875>plaister<s%>:

And thou shalt <S%H3789>write<s%> upon them all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H8451>law<s%>, when thou art passed <S%H5674>over<s%>, that thou mayest go <S%H935>in<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee, a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>floweth<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> hath <S%H1696>promised<s%> thee.

Therefore it shall be when ye be gone <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, that ye shall set <S%H6965>up<s%> these <S%H68>stones<s%>, which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>, in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5858>Ebal<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H7875>plaister<s%> them with <S%H7874>plaister<s%>.

And there shalt thou <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, an <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%>: thou shalt not lift <S%H5130>up<s%> any <S%H1270>iron<s%> tool upon them.

Thou shalt <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8003>whole<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H5927>offer<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> thereon unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>:
And thou shalt <S%H2076>offer<s%> peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>, and shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> there, and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H3789>write<s%> upon the <S%H68>stones<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H3190>very<s%> <S%H874>plainly<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Take <S%H5535>heed<s%>, and <S%H8085>hearken<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; this <S%H3117>day<s%> thou art <S%H1961>become<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.

Thou shalt therefore <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, which I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>charged<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

These shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> upon <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1630>Gerizim<s%> to <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, when ye are come <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>; <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, and <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>:

And these shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> upon <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5858>Ebal<s%> to <S%H7045>curse<s%>; <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and <S%H836>Asher<s%>, and <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, and <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>. to curse: Heb. for a cursing
And the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H6030>speak<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with a <S%H7311>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%>,

<S%H779>Cursed<s%> be the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H6213>maketh<s%> any <S%H6459>graven<s%> or molten <S%H4541>image<s%>, an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H2796>craftsman<s%>, and <S%H7760>putteth<s%> it in a <S%H5643>secret<s%> place. And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H6030>answer<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>.
<S%H779>Cursed<s%> be he that setteth <S%H7034>light<s%> by his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother<s%>. And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>.
<S%H779>Cursed<s%> be he that <S%H5253>removeth<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbour's<s%> <S%H1366>landmark<s%>. And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>.
<S%H779>Cursed<s%> be he that maketh the <S%H5787>blind<s%> to <S%H7686>wander<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way<s%>. And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>.

<S%H779>Cursed<s%> be he that <S%H5186>perverteth<s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, and <S%H490>widow<s%>. And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>.

<S%H779>Cursed<s%> be he that <S%H7901>lieth<s%> with his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>; because he <S%H1540>uncovereth<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H3671>skirt<s%>. And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>.
<S%H779>Cursed<s%> be he that <S%H7901>lieth<s%> with any manner of <S%H929>beast<s%>. And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>.

<S%H779>Cursed<s%> be he that <S%H7901>lieth<s%> with his <S%H269>sister<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%>, or the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of his <S%H517>mother<s%>. And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>.
<S%H779>Cursed<s%> be he that <S%H7901>lieth<s%> with his mother in <S%H2859>law<s%>. And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>.
<S%H779>Cursed<s%> be he that <S%H5221>smiteth<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%> <S%H5643>secretly<s%>. And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>.

<S%H779>Cursed<s%> be he that <S%H3947>taketh<s%> <S%H7810>reward<s%> to <S%H5221>slay<s%> an <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H1818><s%>. And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>.

<S%H779>Cursed<s%> be he that <S%H6965>confirmeth<s%> not all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H8451>law<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> them. And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>.
